quote_first: At zero hour minus one minute,
quote_last: on March the twenty-first, Jiffy Tripp stood in the tranches beside an infantry officer, looking over no man’s land. It was still dark. At zero hour plus five seconds the shell bursts actually threw a sort of witch’s kaleidoscope onto no man’s land, and he was reaching for the SOS rockets. Red - green - red.
title: God's Sparrows
author: Phillip Child
